Summary._: Northbound [A] and [C] trains are running with delays because of signal problems at Hoyt-Schermerhorn.

Description._:
[A] and [C] trains are running with delays in both directions because of signal problems at Hoyt-Schermerhorn Sts.

Our crews are on site working to fix the problem as quickly as possible.

Summary._: [A] and [S]-Rockaway Park shuttle trains are running with delays because of signal problems at Rockaway Park-B 116 St.

Description._: [A] and [S]-Rockaway Park shuttle trains are running with delays because of signal problems at Rockaway Park-B 116 St.

LongDescription: [A] and [S]-Rockaway Park shuttle trains are running with delays because of signal problems at Rockaway Park-B 116 St.

Summary._: [B], [D], [F], [N] and [W] trains are detoured and delayed because of ongoing signal problems between Rockefeller Ctr and 7 Av. See mta.info

Description._:
[B] trains are stopping along the [Q] line from DeKalb Av to 96 At-2 Av in both directions.

[D] trains are running local from 145 St to 59 St-Columbus Circle in both directions.

[N] trains are stopping along the [R] line from DeKalb Av to Lexington Av/59 St.

There is no [W] train service from Astoria-Ditmars Blvd to Whitehall St-South Ferry in both directions.

These service changes are because of ongoing signal problems between 47-50 Sts Rockefeller Ctr and 7 Av.

Expect delays on [B], [D], [F], [N], [Q], and [R] lines.

Our crews are on site working to fix it as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated.

LongDescription:
[B] trains are stopping along the [Q] line from DeKalb Av to 96 At-2 Av in both directions.
[D] trains are running local from 145 St to 59 St-Columbus Circle in both directions.
[N] trains are stopping along the [R] line from DeKalb Av to Lexington Av/59 St.
There is no [W] train service from Astoria-Ditmars Blvd to Whitehall St-South Ferry in both directions.
These service changes are because of ongoing signal problems between 47-50 Sts Rockefeller Ctr and 7 Av.
Expect delays on [B], [D], [F], [N], [Q], and [R] lines.
Our crews are on site working to fix it as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated.

Summary._: SIGNAL MAINTENANCE  Broad St-bound [J] & Forest Hills-bound [M] trains run express from Broadway Junction to Marcy Av

Description._: SIGNAL MAINTENANCE  Broad St-bound [J] & Forest Hills-bound [M] trains run express from Broadway Junction to Marcy Av

LongDescription: <b><i>SIGNAL MAINTENANCE</i><br clear=left>Broad St-bound [J] & Forest Hills-bound [M] trains run express from Broadway Junction to Marcy Av</b>D</font>ays, 9:45 AM to 3:30 PM, Mon to Fri, Jan 8 - 12<br><br>Trains stop at Myrtle Av.                                                                               [TP]<br> <br></font>For service <i>to</i> Chauncey, Halsey Sts, Gates Av and Kosciuszko St</font>, take the [J] or [M] to Myrtle Av<br>and transfer to a Jamaica Center-bound [J] or Brooklyn-bound [M].<br><br>For service <i>to</i> Flushing Av, Lorimer and Hewes Sts, take the [J] or [M] to Essex St*<br>and transfer to a Jamaica Center-bound [J] or Brooklyn-bound [M].<br><br></font>For service<i> from</i> these stations, take the [J] or [M] to Myrtle Av or Broadway Junction and transfer to a <br>Broad St-bound [J] or Forest Hills-bound [M].<br><br><i>*Transfer at Marcy Av with <a href=http://web.mta.info/metrocard/mcgtreng.htm#unlimited target=_blank><font color=#0000FF>Unlimited Ride MetroCard</font></a>.<br><br><b>Alternate travel note:<br></b></i>Take the <a href=http://web.mta.info/nyct/bus/schedule/bkln/b046cur.pdf target=_blank><font color=#0000FF>B46</font></a> bus via transfer at Myrtle Av or Marcy Av.<br><br><table class=plannedworkTableStyle  border=1 cellspacing=1 cellpadding=5 rules=none frame=box><td>  [ad]  <td><font size=1>This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning<br>your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.  </font></table><br><b><br>
